name: DOPEVINE TECHNOLOGY
description: Dopevine Technology was started in December 2020, Dopevine Technology is a Decentralized Financial Blockchain Solutions that will be providing services to a large market base, our goal is to improving financial performance using Decentralized Finance (DEFI), our Vision is to advance financial independence and financial freedom through DEFI using the blockchain system, we have a large market base that will benefit overtime using our services, the Crypto, NFT & Metaverse Market has huge potential and now is the best time to invest now that we are in the bear market, it's now the investment and building is happening because when the bull market comes we all going to make it (WAGMI)
payDisclosure: Dopevine Technology provides web3 services to a large market base in order to also expand the exposure and adoptability. We want to have millions of customers using our services and also have a net worth of over $500M which will all happen within 5 years
